select * from yb_appeal_result_repayment_view where 1=1 and id like concat('%', #{ ybAppealResultRepaymentView.id} ,'%')

AND ybAppealResultRepaymentView.applyDate <= applyDateTo}
and applyDateStr like concat('%', #{ ybAppealResultRepaymentView.applyDateStr} ,'%')

AND ybAppealResultRepaymentView.belongDate <= belongDateTo}

AND ybAppealResultRepaymentView.costDate <= costDateTo}
and costDateStr like concat('%', #{ ybAppealResultRepaymentView.costDateStr} ,'%')
and hospitalizedNo like concat('%', #{ ybAppealResultRepaymentView.hospitalizedNo} ,'%')
